page.title: 17Updated shopping list 2011
page.content:
1. A can of Coca Cola 29p

2. A Mars bar 49p

3. 1 Dozen eggs £1.25

4. 250g of butter £1.10

5. ITunes single download 49p-99p

6. 1L of petrol £1.39

7.HD Colour LCD TV with Freeview £79.99

8. Compaq laptop £279 Desktop pc incl monitor £349

9. A microwave 29.97

10. Ford Focus basic £13,995

These were the cheapest prices found on one of the 3 major supermarket online grocery stores on 26/10/2011. Sainsburys /Tesco/ Asda. The most basic or cheapest options were chosen.
